name: HUD enough
description:
My entry to GMTK 2020 Game Jam. 

HUD Enough is a top down shooter in which a ghost from your enemies possesses the  HUD(heads up display) elements in the game. 

HOW TO PLAY
Kill enemies by shooting them, or using a spinning melee attack, score as much points as you can and survive while the HUD falls apart in your game.

enemies will come from all direction, stops when near you and will start attacking.

The health bar, score indicator, bullet indicator will move through the screen, you can put them back to their original places to stop this behavior.

NOTE: Shooting these possessed HUD element decreases your health so if your planning to put it back to its place make sure to TURN ON SAFETY. Putting the possessed HUD element back to its place also have a chance to replenish your health.

If a ghost interacts with your Gun safety indicator it will reverse the current configuration. (Making a turned off safety configuration to on configuration and vice versa).

Take a close look at the gun, there are visual cues, you can use to your advantage.

Controls : 
Move the mouse to aim at the desired direction. 
Left Mouse button to shoot
Right Mouse button for a melee attack
R for Reload
SpaceBar for turning the gun's safety ON and OFF, turning ON the safety means that you will not shoot when Right mouse button is pressed.

have fun, I hope you play until you had enough.
or until you  scream HUD, Enough!
